revised_title: Investigating the Spontaneous Crystallization of Binary Mixtures: Experiments on Salol and Betol
tldr: This study investigates the spontaneous crystallization of binary mixtures, specifically salol and betol, by determining the temperature of crystallization and analyzing the changing constitution of the liquid using refractive indices. The authors also explore the solubility and freezing-point curves for these mixtures and discuss the concept of multiple freezing points in alloys and other mixtures.
